title: Ye Men Grill
typeOfFood: Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Arabic, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Turkish grill, opened Dec 2014. Has a separate menu for veg food that includes tofu wrap, tofu kebab, tofu plate, tofu and vegetables on a spit, and falafel. Owner understand what vegan food means. Note that meat skewers in plain view.
